name: Erroneous call rate too high
description: Detects a constantly high erroneous call rate when the average value within the last four minutes is above the given threshold value.

fields.name: content
fields.value:
1. Check network connectivity and ensure that there are no issues with your internet connection or server availability.
   2. Investigate any recent changes in your application, software, or hardware configurations that could potentially impact call quality or stability.
   3. Review error logs and metrics related to call handling and processing to identify any patterns or trends that may be contributing to the high erroneous call rate.
   4. Implement necessary corrective actions based on the findings from your investigation, such as adjusting parameters, updating software, or repairing faulty components.
   5. Continuously monitor the erroneous call rate and other relevant performance metrics after implementing fixes to ensure that the issue has been fully resolved and does not recur.
